title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G Camera Review

content.rendered:
After the release of the new Samsung range, we’re sure you want to hear our Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G camera review. From the smallest lenses to the HUGE main camera, there’s a lot to enjoy with this amazing smartphone camera. We would even trade in the digital camera for this fantastic system!

 

Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G Camera System

On the back of the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G, you can find a quad lens camera. Regular camera updates is something that Samsung fans look forward to every single year. The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G camera is one to be proud of. 

The first addition to this camera is a 108MP wide lens. This is the lens you’ll be using the most as it offers the most regular angle and photograph. Each photo taken with this camera will be full of detail. You’ll get realistic outcomes for a photo that seriously pops.

There’s also a 10MP periscope telephoto lens in this system. Essentially, this offers a huge level of zoom. In fact, you can get up to 10x hybrid zoom from this device. This allows you to zoom in and get amongst the action from further away than ever before. The best thing about it is that you won’t lose out on any details or resolution when doing this. It’ll feel as though your photos were taken from much closer than they actually were.

A very similar addition is the 10MP telephoto lens. From this, you can get 3x optical zoom. This will also allow you to get much closer to your subject for a very high quality photo. This is the best option for zooming into closer objects.

The final addition to the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G camera system is a 12MP ultra wide lens. Using this lens, you’re going to be able to capture more of the world around you in a single photo. Essentially, this lens takes a step back and provides you with a larger frame to photograph with.

 

Selfie Camera

On the front of the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G, you can find a 40MP selfie camera. This sits in a very small punch hole housing in the top centre of the display. Samsung have reduced this camera down to an extremely small hole to give the user a full screen experience.

This selfie camera is actually a wide lens. Wide lenses offer regular angles, large enough to fit most of your environment around you. It doesn’t offer any special effects however, it does offer very high resolution images. All of your selfies will hold huge amounts of detail and be of the highest quality.

Not only does this camera offer some amazing features, but it also offers dual video calling. Dual video call allows you to be on video calls with your friends and family. You can then show them something using the rear camera whilst still staying visible with the front camera. This way, you can keep that connection with your friends and family with no issues. The selfie camera also features auto HDR. HDR is the process your camera carries out to make sure your photos are the highest quality available. It requires your phone to take 3 different photos at the same time. These are then blended together with the best parts from each photo. The end result is a very high quality, detailed photo. 

 

Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G Deals

Here at fonehouse, we work with a huge range of the best networks in the UK. One of our top networks is EE. They have a variety of plans available for the S21 Ultra 5G. Whether you’re looking for low prices or valuable packages, they’ve got what you need. When you join EE with one of our amazing contracts, you’ll also get access to their entertainment package. This gives you the chance to enjoy multiple 3-6 month subscriptions during your contract. 

We also have fantastic Vodafone plans for the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G available right now! Vodafone is an amazing network that provides a very high quality service at all points. Through their online app, you’re able to enjoy discounts on huge brands and companies you may have never heard of. Every now and then, they’ll even run a giveaway, offering items such as coffee makers or weekends away! This is just one of many perks that make Vodafone one of the most valuable networks to be a part of.

Three is the final network that you’re able to purchase the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra on. If you want a large data plan, Three is perfect for you. They’re known for their huge packages that also have very affordable prices. Of course, there are also a few extra perks you’re able to enjoy. One of the most important being Go Roam. With this, you can use your monthly allowance in destinations in the AU, USA and Australia FOR FREE!

 

After taking a look through our Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G camera review, you’re bound to fall in love with this amazing handset. Lucky for you, we’ve got some of the best deals available on the market. Whether you’re looking for something with a low monthly cost or something with a huge data package, we’ve got what you need.
